document.full_text: at least 27 people were found dead in a guatemalan village near the border with mexico sunday morning in one of the worst mass killings in the country in a generation, local police said.
document.title: 27 killed in guatemala massacre near mexico border
lines_and_colors: at least 27 people were found dead in a guatemalan village near the border with mexico sunday morning in one of the worst mass killings in the country in a generation, local police said.
